SPOM.content: why is Derrida so late to Marx? he believes in political virtue of contretemps
SPOM.linkedContent: why is Derrida so late to Marx? he believes in political virtue of contretemps

SPOM.content: ghost is there [re: de-limitation of critique] in the opening of the promise, before its first apparition, from the first it will have come second, deux fois à la fois, itérabilité originaire, virtualité irréductible de cet espace et de ce temps
SPOM.linkedContent: ghost is there [re: de-limitation of critique] in the opening of the promise, before its first apparition, from the first it will have come second, deux fois à la fois, itérabilité originaire, virtualité irréductible de cet espace et de ce temps

POO.content: Poe [Purloined Letter] tells the secret twice, w/out same secret being penetrated, matter of trace, secret can be announced w/out being revealed or secret is manifest but still in need of translation
POO.linkedContent: Poe [Purloined Letter] tells the secret twice, w/out same secret being penetrated, matter of trace, secret can be announced w/out being revealed or secret is manifest but still in need of translation

POOF.content: contretemps, 2x, plus d’un, 2 moments at the same time [my friends, no friend]
POOF.linkedContent: contretemps, 2x, plus d’un, 2 moments at the same time [my friends, no friend]

POOF.content: time of surviving (btwn mourning & its possibility) gives itself in withdrawal, self-delivers, self-effaces 2x—constancy & beginning again: indefinite repetition of inaugural moment, keeps memory & anticipates > contre-jour of this contretemps, condition/possibility of friendship
POOF.linkedContent: time of surviving (btwn mourning & its possibility) gives itself in withdrawal, self-delivers, self-effaces 2x—constancy & beginning again: indefinite repetition of inaugural moment, keeps memory & anticipates > contre-jour of this contretemps, condition/possibility of friendship

POOF.content: hexis, contretemporal habitus: yoke-effect (l’effet de joug), binds 2x in same time: duration & omnitemporality, marks/hides in masking—another name for psukhé > hexis insufficient for friendship, remains a simulacrum
POOF.linkedContent: hexis, contretemporal habitus: yoke-effect (l’effet de joug), binds 2x in same time: duration & omnitemporality, marks/hides in masking—another name for psukhé > hexis insufficient for friendship, remains a simulacrum

POOF.content: analogy btwn spirit (nous) & animal body inscribes in living body habitus of this contretemps
POOF.linkedContent: analogy btwn spirit (nous) & animal body inscribes in living body habitus of this contretemps

POOF.content: terrible but so just law of contretemps

difference btwn talking to them [o my friends/enemies] & speaking of them [there are no friends/enemies]: world of difference, fort/da, record their absence after having called ——the contretemps [appealing to other presupposes his presence, allows him to come, while distancing/retarding his arrival] dictates, as insane as it is inevitable, the teleiopoetic sentence > expectation of Messiah as unbearable terror: hatred of what is thus awaited?
POOF.linkedContent: difference btwn talking to them [o my friends/enemies] & speaking of them [there are no friends/enemies]: world of difference, fort/da, record their absence after having called ——the contretemps [appealing to other presupposes his presence, allows him to come, while distancing/retarding his arrival] dictates, as insane as it is inevitable, the teleiopoetic sentence > expectation of Messiah as unbearable terror: hatred of what is thus awaited?

POOF.content: temporal torsion [O my friend, no friend, contretemps], dissymmetry envelops theoretical knowledge in performativity of prayer it could never exhaust, we return to question of the response
POOF.linkedContent: temporal torsion [O my friend, no friend, contretemps], dissymmetry envelops theoretical knowledge in performativity of prayer it could never exhaust, we return to question of the response

BL.content: from title to incipit [re: Vor dem Gesetz], 2 moments, repetition, the same > dividing of letter, “it [the repetition itself] splits the boundary by dividing its line”
BL.linkedContent: from title to incipit [re: Vor dem Gesetz], 2 moments, repetition, the same > dividing of letter, “it [the repetition itself] splits the boundary by dividing its line”

A.content: death, impossible simultaneity (where one and the other arrive together), contretemps
A.linkedContent: death, impossible simultaneity (where one and the other arrive together), contretemps

PAS.content: intempestive (untimely), that which we are least prepared to follow
PAS.linkedContent: intempestive (untimely), that which we are least prepared to follow

PAS.content: you want to lose your name, and w/ tout autre calculus, you don’t want to get out of it
PAS.linkedContent: you want to lose your name, and w/ tout autre calculus, you don’t want to get out of it

PPHS.content: when Being is presence, sign can only be a transition, lieu de passage, (provisional) bridge btwn 2 moments of full presence, the bridge can be relevé
PPHS.linkedContent: when Being is presence, sign can only be a transition, lieu de passage, (provisional) bridge btwn 2 moments of full presence, the bridge can be relevé

DS.content: never has anteriority of 1st (simple) over 2nd (double) been displaced by a metaphysical system, double de-presents, il le multiplie par suite, le double vient après le simple, the flesh & blood, l’image survient à la réalité > this is ontology
DS.linkedContent: never has anteriority of 1st (simple) over 2nd (double) been displaced by a metaphysical system, double de-presents, il le multiplie par suite, le double vient après le simple, the flesh & blood, l’image survient à la réalité > this is ontology

DS.content: priority of art over nature still privileges order 1 then 2, the preference, the precedence (pré-séance) of the imitated
DS.linkedContent: priority of art over nature still privileges order 1 then 2, the preference, the precedence (pré-séance) of the imitated

DS.content: no total/proper meaning because blank folds over (se plie), dès que le blanc (est) blanc, (se) blanchit, as soon as there’s a mark, there’s a re-mark, no blank w/ capital B, no theology of Text, yet desire for reappropriation, structural site of theological trap, is produced, nourished, in very act of separating from it
DS.linkedContent: no total/proper meaning because blank folds over (se plie), dès que le blanc (est) blanc, (se) blanchit, as soon as there’s a mark, there’s a re-mark, no blank w/ capital B, no theology of Text, yet desire for reappropriation, structural site of theological trap, is produced, nourished, in very act of separating from it

DS.content: mark (same word as margin or marche): word and blank between words > marked twice
DS.linkedContent: mark (same word as margin or marche): word and blank between words > marked twice

DS.content: difference  is the necessary interval, suspense btwn 2 outcomes, “lapse of time” btwn 2 shots, rolls, chances > a game of chance forever new, a play of fire forever young > fire & games (via Nietzsche, Heraclitus), play of luck w/ necessity: a hymen btwn chance & rule
DS.linkedContent: difference is the necessary interval, suspense btwn 2 outcomes, “lapse of time” btwn 2 shots, rolls, chances > a game of chance forever new, a play of fire forever young > fire & games (via Nietzsche, Heraclitus), play of luck w/ necessity: a hymen btwn chance & rule

ROP.content: for Foucault, psychoanalysis oscillates on both sides of dividing line, in two places, two times, at same time (but he does not think these two times w/ structural possibility of event)
ROP.linkedContent: for Foucault, psychoanalysis oscillates on both sides of dividing line, in two places, two times, at same time (but he does not think these two times w/ structural possibility of event)

ROP.content: untimeliness always disturbs the contemporary who reassures him/herself in a “we” > this “we,” our “we,” is not its own contemporary
ROP.linkedContent: untimeliness always disturbs the contemporary who reassures him/herself in a “we” > this “we,” our “we,” is not its own contemporary

ATIA.content: contretemps of 2 nudities w/out nudity: 1) animal in non-nudity because nude 2) man in nudity so no longer nude
ATIA.linkedContent: contretemps of 2 nudities w/out nudity: 1) animal in non-nudity because nude 2) man in nudity so no longer nude

SW.content: [re: Exodus 26:31] there are 2 veils/curtains btwn [holy/sanctuary] tabernacle & [holy/sanctuary] tabernacle of tabernacles [of holies/of sanctuaries] > 1st embroidered by artist, 2nd merely the work of a carpenter
SW.linkedContent: [re: Exodus 26:31] there are 2 veils/curtains btwn [holy/sanctuary] tabernacle & [holy/sanctuary] tabernacle of tabernacles [of holies/of sanctuaries] > 1st embroidered by artist, 2nd merely the work of a carpenter

SW.content: bookmark the fringes, they served once to accomplish a commandment, may another be accomplished w/ them [Kitsour…] > that’s what I’m doing, à contretemps, et signe et livre et date
SW.linkedContent: bookmark the fringes, they served once to accomplish a commandment, may another be accomplished w/ them [Kitsour…] > that’s what I’m doing, à contretemps, et signe et livre et date

DPi.content: contretemps of “too soon,” “too late” — essential anachronism of DP
DPi.linkedContent: contretemps of “too soon,” “too late” — essential anachronism of DP

RM.content: WM marks itself off from making death or dead metaphor its watchword (mot d’ordre) [Ricouer’s accusation] by saying there’re 2 deaths/self-destructions of metaphor > 2 deaths means problem of death is infinitely complicated
RM.linkedContent: WM marks itself off from making death or dead metaphor its watchword (mot d’ordre) [Ricouer’s accusation] by saying there’re 2 deaths/self-destructions of metaphor > 2 deaths means problem of death is infinitely complicated

PJP.content: d’avoir perjuré en jurant: 2 moments of perjury envelop each other; was the promise not to lie, the swearing, truthful?
PJP.linkedContent: d’avoir perjuré en jurant: 2 moments of perjury envelop each other; was the promise not to lie, the swearing, truthful?

PJP.content: the 2 moments are rigorously distinct & strangely indiscernible: difference of times inscribed under law, contract, this law is the Law itself (annuls the difference, sublates into fidelity of oath)
PJP.linkedContent: the 2 moments are rigorously distinct & strangely indiscernible: difference of times inscribed under law, contract, this law is the Law itself (annuls the difference, sublates into fidelity of oath)

PJP.content: ultimate resource/fatality of the anacoluthon: multiplicity of times, instants, interruption time inscribes in “me” > the perjurer can always ask to be excused
PJP.linkedContent: ultimate resource/fatality of the anacoluthon: multiplicity of times, instants, interruption time inscribes in “me” > the perjurer can always ask to be excused

D.content: two is no more an accident of one than one is a secondary surplus of zero (or vice versa): reconsider notion of accident, secondariness, surplus
D.linkedContent: two is no more an accident of one than one is a secondary surplus of zero (or vice versa): reconsider notion of accident, secondariness, surplus

ATM.content: Levinas’ 2 instances of “en ce moment même,” le même moment: one belongs to the dialectic, the other has an infinite advance on the 1st, differs/defers it, and yet it is the same
ATM.linkedContent: Levinas’ 2 instances of “en ce moment même,” le même moment: one belongs to the dialectic, the other has an infinite advance on the 1st, differs/defers it, and yet it is the same

ATM.content: no tear (déchirure) possible in Levinas’ text w/out a certain notching (échancrure) of the 2nd moment, and certain contamination btwn the 2 > he likes the tear he detests contamination
ATM.linkedContent: no tear (déchirure) possible in Levinas’ text w/out a certain notching (échancrure) of the 2nd moment, and certain contamination btwn the 2 > he likes the tear he detests contamination

AD.content: the instantaneous meantime of the decision (l’entretemps instantané de la décision), contretemps, hiatus, or non-response, discontinues speech and is gift of speech
AD.linkedContent: the instantaneous meantime of the decision (l’entretemps instantané de la décision), contretemps, hiatus, or non-response, discontinues speech and is gift of speech

OG.content: impossible to describe continuity, passage, from inarticulate to articulate, pure nature to culture, plenitude to play of supplementarity > Rousseau attempts to reconcile (concilier) the 2 times after describing the birth, the being-born, of supplement
OG.linkedContent: impossible to describe continuity, passage, from inarticulate to articulate, pure nature to culture, plenitude to play of supplementarity > Rousseau attempts to reconcile (concilier) the 2 times after describing the birth, the being-born, of supplement
